name: City16
description:
City16 is a city-building sandbox with 16x16 screen resolution. It was originally developed for itch.io’s LOWREZJAM 2019.  

NOTE: My English isn't perfect. I'm sorry for this.

Every pixel represents an area or a building in the game. Select from 15 structures to build: houses, factories, airports, mineshafts, dockyards, etc. Make a city, maintain it and increase your score! 

City16 is short. You can complete it in 15-20 minutes. I hope you'll enjoy it.

Report bugs here: fednazar24@ukr.net or leave a comment.

Music:

"Industrious Ferret" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

System Requirements:

  • Windows 7 or higher
  • .NET Framework 4 or higher
